Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Responsible for sales target in the given territory;
              
              - Support wholesalers in given territory for all sales activities;
              
              - Responsible for credit control of wholesalers in the given territory
              
              -  Implement market expansion stratergy given by the company
              
              - Survey market and propose effective sales & promotion policy to company
              
              - Training wholesalers in using sales controling software…
              
              - Going on business trips to support wholesalers frequently
              
              - Supporting jobs:
              
              (i)- Join any events as requested by company: wholesaler meeting, Gala party, new products launching
              
              (ii)- Supoport for marketing section in other event: racing, motor sport show, fair, customer care…
              
              (iii)- Support for other administration jobs in HCM branch when required.
              
              - Propose marketing activities to advertise the company image and trademark and follow marketing plans as approved
              
              - Conduct market survey activities

Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Male/female, age under 30
              
              - University graduation with major: marketing/business administration/trading, economics
              
              - Good at Microsoft office Applications
              
              - Fluent in verbal and written Engish
              
              - Ready for local business trip
              
              - Dynamic, creative, resourceful, adaptable & reliable
              
              + Effective project management skills
              
              + Sound understanding of marketing principles
              
              + Strong administration and organizational skills
              
              + Able to work independently with minimal on-site direct supervision & in a team
              
              + Ability to manage complex information and present in a concise and simplified format
